name: DROPDODGE
description:
DROPDODGE

Made for the indie teams jam

Dropdodge is a game made in a week following the theme of 'drop'. You control a business man who is freefalling in the air after his plane exploded. Now he needs to try and dodge the rapidly descending debris all around him in order to not pass out.

Gameplay is endless, but features an optional challenge. Play the game in your browser or download it and see if you're good enough to reach 1500!

Massive thanks to gamedev demon for working on this project with me https://gamedev-demon.itch.io/!
